name: traveltheworld1
short_description:
Seize the day. Words to life by. Do you feel as though you are not more of a fumbler than a seizer in your career? Is your job the kind where all the days kind of morph together into a blur that you are not all that interested in anymore?

Fear not. It is never too late to become a seizer. Traveling may be your way to clarity. Jobs where you travel can unlock that option.

I was in India when a funeral procession passes me on a crowded street, a closely knitted group of men balancing a shrouded body above their heads. I could have touched them, they passed by so closely. You see, I had one of those jobs that travel the world. Based in Japan, it was easy for me to travel to places of wonder.

Travel the world jobs and careers can be tough. You will have to become a seizer.
